// ignore undefined macros for convenience.
#ifndef TL_START
#define TL_START(...)
#endif 

#ifndef TL_END
#define TL_END()
#endif 

// translations
#ifndef TL_TEXT
#define TL_TEXT(...)
#endif

#ifdef TL_ENABLE_FORMAT
#ifndef TL_FORMAT
#define TL_FORMAT(...)
#endif
#endif

// TL_INFO contains source locations used for matching strings for merging changes.
// generated by string extraction.
#ifndef TL_INFO
#define TL_INFO(...)
#endif 

// annotation that the string extractor did not find or match the string.
#ifndef TL_NO_MATCH
#define TL_NO_MATCH(...)
#endif 

// annotation that the string was matched but it's possible the match is incorrect using rules.
#ifndef TL_MAYBE
#define TL_MAYBE(...)
#endif
